sentences.english: This announcement will arouse a feeling of anger among freedom-loving people.
sentences.chinese: 這一宣告將會激起愛好自由人們的憤怒。

sentences.english: Increased positive feelings and reduced feelings of anxiety, anger and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 增加正面的工作情緒，減少緊張，憤怒及懮傷。

sentences.english: We furiously exclaimed upon the wickedness of the plot they conspired against our company.
sentences.chinese: 我們憤怒譴責他們對我們公司策劃的陰謀。

sentences.english: Then she began to angrily hallo me.
sentences.chinese: 然後她開始向我憤怒地大喊大叫起來。
我是喬熱血沸騰的憤怒。

sentences.english: Anger is a hurricane with the power to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒是擁有摧毀一切力量的颶風。

sentences.english: Angered even further, Kojiro leapt into combat, blinded by rage.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小次郎更加憤怒了，而被怒氣遮蔽了雙眼。

sentences.english: This very hot aspect could produce angry outbursts.
sentences.chinese: 這個火爆的合相將會帶來憤怒的爆發。

sentences.english: S. was considering compulsory Iraq service for its diplomatic corps, but thee-mails sparked outrage nevertheless.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這些電子郵件還是引發了一片憤怒。

sentences.english: From his parents’ face express we can read surprise and anger.
sentences.chinese: 從他父母的表情中我們讀出了驚愕和憤怒。

sentences.english: A fault line of anger and distrust crossed his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒和懷疑在他額頭上刻下了皺紋。

sentences.english: It's natural for the guests to feel anger and despair as they face their ineluctable deaths.
sentences.chinese: 面對無法逃避的死亡，客人們自然會感到憤怒和絕望。

sentences.english: We could seetheblood vesselsinhis temple pulsate ashe became more angry.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以看到血管搏動他的廟宇，他變得更加憤怒。

sentences.english: A furious player kicked his racket into the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 一位憤怒的球員將他的球拍踢向了看臺。

sentences.english: Totapuri flew into a rage and was about to beat the man.
sentences.chinese: 多達布里異常憤怒，正打算要打這個人。

sentences.english: Or I have been walking around with unexpressed anger for days.
sentences.chinese: 或者我這幾天在外散步沒有把憤怒表達出來。

definition: to move emotionally/to stir up (emotions)/to excite
